name: Atlantis in Peril
text:
You may flip to alter-ego form. Choose:
Exhaust Namor McKenzie → remove Atlantis in Peril from the game.
Shuffle your discard pile into your deck. Deal an encounter card to you. Discard this obligation.

name: Atlantis Attacks
text: When Revealed: If the Namor McKenzie player has 15 or less remaining cards in their deck, place 3 additional threat here.

name: Attuma
text: When Revealed: Discard the top 5 cards of your deck [star]Forced Response: After Attuma attacks you, discard cards from the top of your deck equal to damage dealt. [star]Boost: Discard cards from the top of your deck equal to cards in your hand.

name: Atlantean Traitor
text: When Revealed: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. [star]Boost: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck. “Do you know who I am?!?” -Namor

name: Incited Conflict
text: When Revealed: Discard an ally you control. If no ally was discarded this way, this card gains surge. [star]Boost: Discard the top 3 cards of your deck.
